title: Verify: Selecting the WWE Network Channel successfully opens WWE Network
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND has the installed the latest version of the build (QA, STAGE, PROD)
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "WWE Network" application from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN the "WWE Network" will open successfully

title: Verify: The WWE Network can be accessed while the Apple TV is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND the "WWE Network" channel is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "WWE Network" Channel from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN the "WWE Network" will open successfully

title: Verify: The WWE Network can be accessed while the Apple TV is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to a wired network connection
AND the "WWE Network" channel is installed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "WWE Network" Channel from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN the "WWE Network" will open successfully

title: Verify: User can navigate app even if they have not logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to an Internet connection
AND the "WWE Network" channel is installed
AND the user has not logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the WWE Network channel is accessed
custom_expected:
THEN the home page will show Sign In in the top menu, far right position
AND the user can navigate freely throughout the app

title: Verify: User not signed in is prompted to log in when attempting to access media
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to an Internet connection
AND the "WWE Network" channel is installed
AND we have not logged into the WWE Network with an account
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the WWE Network channel from the main Apple TV screen
AND we attempt to play a video
custom_expected:
THEN we will jump to a Sign In/Sign Up page with the following options:
>>Sign in With My WWE Account
>>Subscribe Now With iTunes
>>Restore iTunes Purchase 

AND on the left side of the screen we see the expected information/upsell screen

title: Pressing the Menu button from the Home returns the user to the Main [Device] Menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we are on the Home Screen
custom_steps: WHEN we press the Menu button
custom_expected:
THEN we will exit the WWE Network Channel
AND we will be returned to the Device's Launch Screen

title: Login: Verify Login message opens via Sign In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the channel
AND we access the WWE Network
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to and select Sign In from the menu
AND we are presented with 3 options 
AND we choose the "Sign In With My WWE Account" option
custom_expected:
THEN we will be presented with a WWE Login screen
AND there is a Login ID field present on the right side of the screen
AND a Submit button displayed underneath
AND there is a keyboard present on the left side of the screen
AND after submitting the Login ID (email), a password field will appear
AND a Submit button displayed underneath

title: Login: Verify Sign In page opens via Media Playback attempt and user can log in to play video
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the WWE Network
AND we attempt to play a video
custom_expected:
THEN we will be presented with the Login screen
AND when we successfully sign in to an entitled account, the selected video will play

title: Login: Verify Login failed
refs: FInd out if error message will include Forget Password info
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the WWE Network channel
AND we activate Sign In
AND we activate Sign In With My WWE Account
AND we enter invalid WWE credentials
custom_expected:
THEN a Login Error Screen will appear
AND a message stating:
>>"Subscription Required - The account name or password was incorrect. Please try again."

AND all formatting and text will be readable
AND an OK button will be present

title: Login: Verify Login failed - Close Message via OK
refs: FInd out if error message will include Forget Password info
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the WWE Network channel
AND we enter invalid WWE credentials
AND when we see the error
AND we activate OK
custom_expected: THEN we will return to Sign In screen

title: Login: Verify Login failed - Close Message via Menu
refs: FInd out if error message will include Forget Password info
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we have not previously logged into an account in the channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the WWE Network channel
AND activate Sign In
AND activate Sign In With My WWE Account
AND we enter invalid WWE credentials
AND when we see the error
AND we push ATV Remote's Menu button
custom_expected: THEN we will return to Sign In screen

title: Login: Verify When User's Password is changed outside of app during app use, user is logged out with appropriate messaging
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network channel
AND we have previously logged into an account in the channel with an entitled account
AND we are playing video
custom_steps:
WHEN we change the password for the logged in account via http://www.wwe.com/wwenetwork
AND we exit video playback
AND we attempt to launch another program
custom_expected:
THEN we receive an error message stating:
>>Play Feed - Invalid user credentials: Invalid user credentials or missing credential information"

AND when we activate OK we are returned to the Login screen no longer signed in

title: Login: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network Channel
AND we are on the Login Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN we look at the Text
AND we look at the buttons
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the text is spelled correctly on the page
AND each section looks like it is formatted correctly

title: Home: Verify when the WWE Network Channel is accessed the user lands on the Home screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has installed the WWE Network
custom_steps: WHEN the WWE Network Channel is launched
custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought to the Home Screen "WWE" menu option by default.

title: Home: Verify Menu options when the WWE Network is accessed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are logged in to an entitled account
custom_steps: WHEN we access the main menu page
custom_expected:
THEN the following options will be listed at the top of the screen:
> WWE
> Schedule
> Shows
> Search
> My Account

title: Home: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Channel
AND we access the Channel
custom_steps: WHEN we traverse the Home Screen options
custom_expected:
THEN all text will be formatted correctly
AND all thumbnails will appear without issue

title: Home: Verify data updates according to EPG schedule
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we are on the Home Screen
AND the Live Broadcast changes
custom_expected:
THEN the Menu will refresh based on the EPG (uses GMT time so offset accordingly) - http://epg.media.net.wwe.com/prod/epg_large2.json
AND the On Now display will update accordingly

title: Feature: Verify Feature area starts with On Now program in center and begins to cycle through Featured Tiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Internet connection is Wired or Wireless
AND the latest build of the WWE Network application is installed
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch the WWE Network application
AND the home "WWE" screen is first displayed
custom_expected:
THEN the Feature/Promo Carousel on top shelf starts with WWE On Now tile centered
AND after a few seconds, the carousel animates and cycles through list of feature tiles

title: Feature: Verify Promotion Carousel Nav and Activation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Section
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Feature Carousel
AND navigate right to left through all of the thumbs
AND left to right through all of the thumbs
AND activate each one
custom_expected:
THEN we can access each thumb
AND each thumb, when activated, jumps to the expected Featured location

title: Feature: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Home Section
AND we look at the listings in the Feature Area
custom_expected:
THEN the Image and text will be formatted correctly 
and text clear and legible

Note: feature carousel is populated by thumbnail assets provided by WWE (with text burned in)

title: Feature: Collections: Verify Show Launch Page appearance and options
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Section
custom_steps:
WHEN we select a Collection listing in the Feature carousel
AND we activate it
custom_expected:
THEN the app will jump to a Collection page 
AND the Collection page appears as expected

title: Feature: OnNow: Verify Show Launch Page appearance and options
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Section
custom_steps:
WHEN we select the On Now listing in the Feature carousel
AND we activate it
custom_expected:
THEN the app will jump to the show's launch page 
AND the show will match the ON NOW content shown in Today's Schedule
AND the user will be presented with "Watch Live" and "From Start" launch options

title: OnNow: Verify Show Launch Page appearance and options
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Section
custom_steps:
WHEN we select the On Now listing in Today's Schedule list
AND we activate it
custom_expected:
THEN the app will jump to Show Launch 
AND the user will be presented with Watch Live and From Start launch options

title: OnNow: Verify that the current LIVE show is properly displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Section
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the On Now listing in Today's Schedule
custom_expected:
THEN the current LIVE show will display
AND the proper promo image will display
AND the metadata will be correct for the show

title: OnNow: Verify that the LIVE show properly updates/refreshes as the day progresses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Section
custom_steps:
WHEN we look at the On Now display in the Feature Area
AND we navigate to this page throughout the course of the day
custom_expected:
THEN the ON NOW section will properly update with the EPG schedule
(http://epg.media.net.wwe.com/prod/epg_large2.json)

title: OnNow: Verify Selecting the ON NOW Feature brings the user to the Live Linear Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are logged in
AND we are on the Home Section
custom_steps:
WHEN we activate the On Now listing in the Feature Area
AND we tap on the WATCH LIVE option
custom_expected:
THEN the LIVE LINEAR feed will launch
AND you must verify that the video begins at an entry point that is NOT from the beginning
(Results may vary depending on the block of time and entry point)

title: Schedule: Verify Today's Schedule appears when user looks on the Home screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home page
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Schedule carousel
custom_expected: THEN Today's programming will appear

title: Schedule: Verify navigation control works in both directions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Page
AND we look at the Schedule screen
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Today's schedule
AND we scroll Right
AND we scroll Left
custom_expected:
THEN we will have navigated down through the On Now asset
AND while on Today's Schedule, be able to navigate in both directions

title: Schedule: Verify Today's schedule properly reflects the current day's programming
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home page
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Today's Schedule row
custom_expected:
THEN Today's schedule will accurately reflect today's content
AND the current On Now program will be featured
AND additional shows will be displayed in various increments
AND the amount of displayed shows for the row will be 5

title: ***Schedule: Verify LIVE broadcasts are labeled as such ("On Now")
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Page
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Today's Schedule row
custom_expected:
THEN the content featured on deck will be listed as ON NOW
AND the episode will be available to view

title: Schedule: Verify schedule flips at 12 AM
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Schedule carousel
AND the time is before 12 AM EST
custom_steps:
WHEN the time hits 12 AM EST
AND we refresh the Home Page
custom_expected: THEN the "Schedule" will accurately reflect the new calendar day

title: Schedule: Verify carousel position focuses on LIVE broadcast when the Schedule Carousel is viewed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we navigated to the Home section
custom_steps:
WHEN we view the Schedule Carousel
AND navigate into the list
custom_expected:
THEN the position will first move to the LIVE (On Now) broadcast
AND once we navigate down to Today, 
THEN we can scroll right to see the rest of the shows for the day

title: UpNext: Verify text and formatting are clear and readable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Home Section
AND we look at the Up Next Image
custom_expected:
THEN the text will be clear
AND the text will be formatted clearly

title: UpNext: Verify that the current NEXT show is properly displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Section
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the UP NEXT tile
custom_expected:
THEN the NEXT program after the current LIVE show will display
AND the proper promo image will display accordingly

title: UpNext: Verify that the Up Next show properly updates/refreshes as the day progresses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Home Section
custom_steps:
WHEN we look at the Up Next tile
AND we navigate to this page throughout the course of the day
custom_expected: THEN the UP NEXT section will properly update with the EPG schedule

title: Continue Watching Content Check
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the WWE app has been launched
AND that the user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to HOME > Continue Watching list
custom_expected:
THEN the content appears as expected (matches user's actual list)
AND all can be navigated to
AND when activated, each jumps to the expected page

title: Watchlist Content Check
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the WWE app has been launched
AND that the user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to HOME > Watchlist
custom_expected:
THEN the content appears as expected (matches user's actual list)
AND all can be navigated to
AND when activated, each jumps to the expected page [check several at random]

title: Shows Content Check
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the WWE app has been launched
AND that the user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to HOME > Shows
custom_expected:
THEN the content appears as expected - http://network.wwe.com/gen/content/tag/v1/list/shows/jsonv4.json
AND all can be navigated to
AND when activated, each jumps to the expected page [test several at random]

title: Recommended Content Check
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the WWE app has been launched
AND that the user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to HOME > Recommended
custom_expected:
THEN the content appears as expected - http://network.wwe.com/gen/content/tag/v1/list/recommended/jsonv4.json
AND all can be navigated to
AND when activated, each jumps to the expected page [test several at random]

title: Shows: Verify navigation to Shows on the Main Menu displays the Show section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps: WHEN we select the Shows section
custom_expected:
THEN we are brought to the Show section
AND the header updates to reflect this
AND the contents update accordingly

title: Shows: Verify Shows Category Navigation Rows appear
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Shows Section
custom_steps: WHEN we look at Shows section content
custom_expected:
THEN category navigation rows will appear in the main section
AND there will be rows for each show category
> PAY-PER-VIEWS
> IN RING
> ORIGINALS
> COLLECTIONS
> VAULT

AND each Category row will display shows

title: Shows: Verify when viewing the Shows the text and thumbnails are formatted appropriately
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows section
custom_steps: WHEN we traverse the section
custom_expected:
THEN all text will be spelled correctly
AND all thumbnails will be formatted correctly
AND all text will be displayed without issue

title: Submenu: Verify Available Shows properly display under the Category Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
custom_steps:
WHEN we traverse the different Categories
AND we scroll to the right
AND we scroll to the left
custom_expected:
THEN all the available shows will display
AND the shows listed will correspond with the appropriate categories

title: Submenu: Verify that we can scroll down to view unseen categories
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate down the page
custom_expected:
THEN the category rows that did not previously appear are visible
AND the thumbnails display
AND we can scroll back up to view the previous category rows

title: Submenu: Verify when viewing the Shows the text and thumbnails are formatted appropriately
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
custom_steps: WHEN we traverse the section
custom_expected:
THEN all text will be spelled correctly
AND all thumbnails will be formatted correctly
AND all text will be displayed without issue

title: ***Submenu: Verify pressing "See All" at the end of a category row brings the user to a Category page
Category: Verify the nav menu clearly displays the category the user is in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the different category rows that are being displayed
custom_expected:
THEN the category rows are clearly labeled
AND the user will know what category they are currently scrolling through

title: Category: Verify that browsing the Category row successfully updates the Available Shows displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
custom_steps: WHEN we traverse the different Category rows
custom_expected:
THEN the Available Shows displayed will be present for selected category
AND each subcategory will bring up its own list of shows

title: Category: Verify that navigation of the available shows is successful
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
custom_steps:
WHEN we access the different category rows
AND we scroll right through the available shows that display
AND we scroll left through the available shows that display
custom_expected:
THEN we will be able to navigate without issue
AND we will be able to reach all available shows

title: Category: Verify user can scroll to see unseen shows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
custom_steps:
WHEN we go to a Category row
AND we navigate to the right
AND we navigate to the left
custom_expected:
THEN the show list will swipe accordingly
AND the additional thumbnails will display

title: Show: Verify accessing a show from the Shows Submenu opens a Show Page successfully
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we are logged into a valid WWE account
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
custom_steps: WHEN we select a random Show
custom_expected:
THEN the Show's Page will open
AND you should observe the following on the right half of the screen:
--Show's title will appear as the Submenu Title at the top-right
--Below the Show's title, the most current year of the show will display (except Collections)
-NOTE:  An angle bracket will be present to the right of the year if prior years are available
--Below the most current year, the option to "Add Series To Watchlist" is present
--Below the "Add Series To Watchlist", the available episodes will appear
AND you should observe the following on the left half of the screen:
--The Episode's image thumbnail
--Below the image thumbnail, the episode's metadata to include:
>>Episode title and TV-rating
>>Description
>>Show, Rating, Runtime, Aired

title: Show: Verify accessing a show from the Pay Per View Submenu opens a Show Page successfully
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Pay Per View Category row
custom_steps: WHEN we select a random Show
custom_expected:
THEN the PPV show's Page will open
AND you should observe the following on the right half of the screen:
--Show's title will appear as the Submenu Title at the top-right
--Below the Show's title, the most current year of the show will display (except Collections)
-NOTE: An angle bracket will be present to the right of the year if prior years are available
--Below the most current year, the available episodes will appear
AND you should observe the following on the left half of the screen:
--The Episode's image thumbnail
--Below the image thumbnail, the episode's metadata to include:

>>Episode title and TV-rating
>>Description
>>Show, Rating, Runtime, Aired

title: Show: Verify that navigation of the available episodes is successful
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to a Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we traverse through the different year rows
AND we can scroll down through the available episodes that display
AND we can scroll up through the available episodes that display
custom_expected:
THEN we will be able to navigate without issue
AND we will be able to reach all available episodes

title: Show: Verify Submenu Title displays the Show Page the user is in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
custom_steps: WHEN we select a random Show
custom_expected:
THEN the Show Page will open
AND the Show's title will appear as the Submenu Title

title: Show: Verify when viewing the Episodes the text and thumbnails are formatted appropriately
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to a random Show Page
custom_steps: WHEN we traverse the Show Page
custom_expected:
THEN all text will be spelled correctly
AND all thumbnails will be formatted correctly
AND all text will be displayed without issue

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we navigate to a Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate an episode with available media
AND we go to the launch page
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video will launch
AND the video will correspond to the thumbnail that originally was selected

title: Show: Verify Show Thumbnails display episode name and air date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
AND we have navigated to a random Show Page
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the available episode row
custom_expected:
THEN the episode thumbnail will display
AND the episode's name will be listed
AND the air date will be displayed

title: Show: Verify currently selected year is properly displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
AND we have navigated to a random Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we look under the show title
AND we look at a random year's row
custom_expected: THEN the year's row header will display the year clearly

title: ***Show: Verify show row episodes display in descending order (newest to oldest)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
AND we have navigated to a random Show Page 
NOTE: Do NOT use Collections category as it operates under a different paradigm
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the episode row
custom_expected:
THEN the episodes will be listed in Descending order
AND the newest episodes will display first in the row
AND the oldest episodes will display last in the row

title: Show: Verify a year's worth of contents displays in the show episode list
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
AND we have navigated to a random Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we select a random year
AND the show page updates with this content
custom_expected: THEN the entire year's content will be displayed

title: ***Show: Verify episode metadata appears accurately and is formatted correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to a Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we look to the episode list for the year
AND we look at the episode metadata
custom_expected:
THEN the episode's metadata will appear correctly
AND the data will be formatted properly
AND the data that appears should be the following:
>>Episode/Show Title and TV-Rating
>>Episode Description
>>Show, Rating, Runtime, Aired

title: Show: Verify available years are accurate to the show's data
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
AND we have navigated to a random Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we traverse the show page
AND view the available year rows
custom_expected:
THEN the years that display will be accurate for the Show's broadcast dates
AND there will not be years for when the show was not broadcasted

title: Show: Verify user is able to navigate to all available year rows in the show page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
AND we have selected a random Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to navigate the different year rows available
AND we scroll right through the available years that display
AND we scroll left through the available years that display
custom_expected:
THEN we will be able to navigate without issue
AND we will be able to reach all available years

title: Episode: Verify accessing an episode from the Show Page opens the Episode Show Launch Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
custom_steps:
WHEN we have navigated to a random Show Page
AND we select a random episode
custom_expected:
THEN we will be brought to the Episode Page
AND the Show's title will appear as the Submenu Title
AND a larger version of the thumbnail will display
AND the show's metadata will be present

title: Episode: Very show metadata appears accurately and is formatted correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to a Show Page
AND we have accessed an Episode Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we look to the right of the episode's image thumbnail
AND we look at the episode's metadata
custom_expected:
THEN the episode's metadata will appear correctly
AND the data will be formatted properly
AND the data that appears should be the following:
>Episode/Show Title and TV-Rating
>Episode Description
>Show, Air Date, Duration

title: Episode: Verify selecting episode launches full screen playback successfully
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we navigate to a Show Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate an episode with available media
AND we navigate to the episode page
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the episode will begin to play
AND the playback will be full screen

title: Episode: Verify Watch Now and Watch From Beginning options display for LIVE shows in progress
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have taken a note of which show is currently 'On Now'
THEN we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
custom_steps:
WHEN we have find and navigate to the LIVE show's Show Page
AND we select the LIVE episode
AND the launch page opens
custom_expected:
THEN we will be provided with two play options
> Watch Now
> Watch From Beginning

title: Episode: Verify choosing Watch Now brings the user to the current LIVE position of the broadcast
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
AND we have accessed the Launch Page for a LIVE program's episode
custom_steps: WHEN we select the Watch Now playback option
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the current LIVE location of the Linear Stream
AND the user will be able to REW for up to an hour from their current location

title: Episode: Verify choosing Watch From Beginning brings the user to the beginning of the broadcast
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Shows Submenu
AND we have accessed the Launch Page for a LIVE broadcast
custom_steps: WHEN we select the Watch From Beginning playback option
custom_expected:
THEN the episode playback will begin
AND the user will be brought to the start of the episode
AND when the episode ends the user will be brought back to the Launch page

**User will have been brought into the GHOST feed, not Linear, by choosing the Watch From Beginning option**

title: Verify: Selecting Schedule from main menu opens page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the WWE Network
AND we are on the Main Menu
custom_steps: WHEN we select Schedule from the menu options
custom_expected: THEN the Schedule page will open accordingly

title: Schedule: Verify navigating to the Schedule page displays the current day as the top row
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Schedule section
custom_steps: WHEN we view the top row (below the On Now featured asset)
custom_expected:
THEN the current day's scheduling will be displayed
AND the header will state that it's "Today <date>"

title: Schedule: Verify user is able to scroll down the page to see additional programming dates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Schedule section
custom_steps:
WHEN we are on the top of the screen
AND we scroll down
custom_expected:
THEN we will see additional date scheduling populate
AND the dates will be accurate
AND we will be able to scroll back up to our original location to see our current day's scheduling

title: Schedule: Verify row headers display properly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Schedule section
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the row headers
custom_expected:
THEN the dates listed will display accurately
AND the text will be formatted correctly

title: Schedule: Verify user is able to view all shows in the row without issue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Schedule section
custom_steps:
WHEN we traverse the days' schedules
AND we scroll right through the different day's events
AND we scroll left through the different day's events
custom_expected:
THEN we will see all of the days' schedule content
AND this will be accurate for the scheduled programming

NOTE:  The last date displayed may not have a complete day's schedule due to the information provided by the EPG
The EPG updates every 30 seconds and can be accessed here: http://epg.media.net.wwe.com/prod/epg_large2.json
RECOMMEND: It's better to use a JSON viewer (e.g http://jsonviewer.stack.hu/)

title: ???? Schedule: Verify item premiering on the channel will be flagged with as "NEW" ???
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND there is new episode content premiering on Today's schedule
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Schedule section
AND we access the Today schedule
AND we locate the NEW episode content playing later today
custom_expected:
THEN with the metadata will be the NEW label
AND this will not be the same color as the metadata

title: ***Schedule: Verify that if asset's media is available as VOD play button is displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND there are archives available for the day's previous content
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Schedule section
AND we view the schedule
AND we locate a show that has previously played
AND the archive has been made available
custom_expected: THEN a Play button overlay will appear over the Video On Demand

title: Schedule: Verify programs display in an ascending order for the given day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we navigated to a day's schedule
custom_steps: WHEN we view the schedule programming
custom_expected:
THEN the day's schedule will begin at 12 AM
AND the schedule will display in Ascending order for the day's content

title: Today: Verify navigation control works in both directions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we navigate to Today's schedule
custom_steps:
WHEN we move the cursor to Today's programming
AND we scroll to the Right
AND we scroll to the Left
custom_expected: THEN we will be able to navigate in both directions

title: Today: Verify Today's schedule properly reflects the current day's programming
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the Today Schedule
custom_expected:
THEN the Today schedule will accurately display the programming schedule for today's content
AND the date will match today's calendar day

title: Today: Verify LIVE broadcasts are labeled as such ("On Now")
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we navigated to the Schedule section
custom_steps:
WHEN we view the Today Schedule
AND we look at the day's content
custom_expected:
THEN the content in the current time block will be listed as ON NOW
AND the episode will be available to view

title: Today: Verify schedule flips at 12 AM
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Schedule section
AND the time is before 12 AM EST
custom_steps:
WHEN the time hits 12 AM EST
AND we select the Today's Schedule
custom_expected: THEN the "Today Schedule" will accurately reflect the new calendar day

title: Today: Verify carousel position focuses on LIVE broadcast when Today schedule is accessed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we navigated to the Schedule section
custom_steps: WHEN we access the Today Schedule and press DOWN
custom_expected: THEN the On Now 'LIVE' asset will be in focus

title: Tomorrow: Verify selecting viewing the Tomorrow row displays the next calendar day's schedule
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we navigated to the Schedule Section
custom_steps: WHEN we view the Tomorrow Schedule row
custom_expected: THEN the schedule for the next calendar day will be present

title: Tomorrow: Verify viewing the Tomorrow Schedule row starts at 12AM of next calendar day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Schedule Section
custom_steps:
WHEN we view the Tomorrow row
AND we look the the upcoming shows
custom_expected:
THEN the Programming Guide will begin at 12 AM of the next calendar day

NOTE:  This result may vary depending on the asset that is playing from the day prior.
If the time does not begin at 12 AM, this does not necessarily constitute a failure so be sure to check the runtime of the asset before it before ruling a decision.

title: Tomorrow: Verify navigation control works in both directions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we navigate to Tomorrow's schedule
custom_steps:
WHEN we move the cursor to the day's programming
AND we scroll to the Right
AND we scroll to the Left
custom_expected:
THEN we will be able to navigate in both directions
AND we will be able to view the entire day's worth of content

title: Search: Verify selecting Search opens the Search Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps: WHEN we select the Search section
custom_expected:
THEN the Nav Bar updates to the Search section
AND the contents update accordingly

title: Search: Verify tapping selecting the "#+=" option switches user to special character options
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Apple TV connected to a wired network connection
AND we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have navigated to the Search Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we look at the Select Character Row
AND we move the cursor to the "#+=" option
AND we select this
custom_expected:
THEN the Select Character keypad will update to the Number/Special Character symbols
AND pressing the ABC option will return the user to the Alphabet Menu Items

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Search page
custom_steps: WHEN we enter search criteria
custom_expected: THEN results will display and will include the tag of the search term

title: Search: Verify that as letters are typed that search terms are auto suggested
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we are on the Search Section
custom_steps:
WHEN we select Search All
AND we begin to type letters
custom_expected:
THEN the right hand window will populate
AND suggested search tag terms will appear

title: Results: Verify selecting an search term brings the user to the Results page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we access the Search section
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter the Search All.. module
AND characters are entered
AND we select a suggested tag
custom_expected:
THEN the page will update
AND the user will be brought to a results grid

title: ***Results: Verify episode and show results display
Search: Verify returned results match metadata tags
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have navigated to the Search Page
AND we have completed entering a valid search term
custom_steps: WHEN we go to the search results
custom_expected:
THEN the results will be an accurate reflection of the Search Term
AND episode will have the expected tag associated with it

title: Search: Verify selecting a Search Result will bring the user to the Show Launch Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have navigated to the Search section
AND we have completed a Search
custom_steps:
WHEN we view the Search Results
AND we select one of the result thumbnails
custom_expected:
THEN we will be brought to the Episode Launch Page
AND it will be for the corresponding thumbnail

title: Results: Verify Results Auto Update based on Keyword
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we access the Search section
custom_steps: WHEN "cena" is entered into the Search field
custom_expected:
THEN the text "John Cena" is offered in auto-complete suggestions
AND can be activated 

Updated 8/17/15 to reflect Search Standardization requirements for Sep. 2015
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/PSOL/WWE+-+Search+Standardization+-+Sept+2015

title: Results: Verify Multiple Results Can Be Scrolled Through
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we access the Search section
custom_steps: WHEN "royal rumble" is entered into the Search field
custom_expected:
THEN user can scroll through multiple Royal Rumble auto-complete suggestions 
AND "Royal Rumble 2015" appears and can be activated 


Updated 8/17/15 to reflect Search Standardization requirements for Sep. 2015
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/PSOL/WWE+-+Search+Standardization+-+Sept+2015

title: Results: Freeform Queries (No Keyword Match) Can Be Searched
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we access the Search section
custom_steps:
WHEN the user inputs "cena vs rock" into the Search Field
AND submits query (even though the term doesn't match against a keyword)
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be presented with approx. 13 related search results

Updated 8/17/15 to reflect Search Standardization requirements for Sep. 2015
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/PSOL/WWE+-+Search+Standardization+-+Sept+2015

title: Account: Verify selecting My Account opens the My Account Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps: WHEN we select the My Account section
custom_expected: THEN the My Accounts section opens accordingly

title: ***Single: Verify Single Sign on Violation occurs after the user connects to more than 5 devices concurrently with the same account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have logged into the account with certain credentials
custom_steps:
WHEN we login to 4 other accounts with the same WWE credentials
AND we login to a 5th account (6th overall)
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a Single Sign On violation
AND the account will be locked
AND the user will be unable to login to any further accounts until this lock out has expired

title: Continue Watching: Verify assets appear without issues
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are logged in with an entitled account
AND we are on the My Account menu option
AND there are assets that are partially watched
custom_steps: WHEN we access the Continue Watching option
custom_expected:
THEN the app will display an accurate list of assets 
AND all text and formatting is clear and readable
AND all thumbnails appear
AND all assets are selectable

title: Continue Watching: Verify video details and launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are logged in with an entitled account
AND we are on the My Account menu option
AND there are assets that are partially watched
AND we access the Continue Watching option
custom_steps: WHEN we select an asset from within the list
custom_expected:
THEN it will navigate to the asset's detail page
AND there are show details that are formatted and legible
AND the image thumbnail appears nicely
AND there are 'Play' and 'Add Episode' buttons
AND selecting the 'Play' button will give options to Resume Playing or Start from Beginning

title: Watchlist: Verify assets appear without issues
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are logged in with an entitled account
AND we are on the My Account menu option
AND there are assets added to the Watchlist
custom_steps: WHEN we access the Watchlist option
custom_expected:
THEN the app will display an accurate list of assets 
AND all text and formatting is clear and readable
AND all thumbnails appear
AND all assets are selectable

title: Watchlist: Verify video details and launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are logged in with an entitled account
AND we are on the My Account menu option
AND there are assets added to the Watchlist
AND we access the Watchlist option
custom_steps: WHEN we select an asset from within the list
custom_expected:
THEN it will navigate to the asset's detail page
AND there are show details that are formatted and legible
AND the image thumbnail appears nicely
AND there are 'Play' and 'Remove Episode' buttons
AND selecting the 'Play' button will launch the video

NOTE: If there is a series instead of an episode in the Watchlist, you will see the episodic layer before getting to the show details

title: ***Verify: Choosing Logout options successfully logs the user out of their account (delinks)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have successfully logged in with a WWE account
custom_steps:
WHEN navigate to the My Account section
and we select Log Out
custom_expected:
THEN we will be successfully logged out of our WWE account
AND we will be returned to the home page

title: ***Verify: Once logged out, previously accessible paid content can no longer be accessed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have successfully logged in with a WWE account
custom_steps:
WHEN navigate to the My Account section
and we select Log Out
custom_expected:
THEN we will be logged out of the WWE Network
AND we will be unable to further access any paid WWE Network content that we could previously access

title: ***Verify: Verify if the user's profile access rights update that these are reflected in the Channel's viewable content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have successfully logged in with a WWE account
custom_steps: WHEN the accounts' access rights/parental restrictions are updated on the WWE website
custom_expected:
THEN the changes will be reflected in the application
AND the newly restricted content will be hidden/removed
OR the newly unrestricted content will now be available

REPEAT for both circumstances

title: ***Verify: Confirm that logging out as one user and logging in as another access rights behave accordingly (unrestricted to restricted)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have successfully logged in with a WWE account
AND the account has no parental restrictions
custom_steps:
WHEN navigate to the My Profile section
AND we select Log Out
AND we login with an account that has parental restrictions
custom_expected:
THEN the new user will be unable to view the previously unrestricted content
AND the content will be hidden accordingly

title: ***Verify: Confirm that logging out as one user and logging in as another access rights behave accordingly (restricted to unrestricted)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have successfully logged in with a WWE account
AND the account has parental restrictions
custom_steps:
WHEN navigate to the My Profile section
AND we select Log Out
AND we login with an account that has NO parental restrictions
custom_expected:
THEN the new user will be able to view the previously restricted content
AND the content will have no access right issues

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Apple TV connected to a wired network connection
AND we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a LIVE video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the feed will play without issue

AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a LIVE video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the feed will play without issue

AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a Video On Demand (archive) video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the feed will play without issue

AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a Video On Demand (archive) video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the feed will play without issue

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Apple TV connected to a wired network connection
AND we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a LIVE video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will launch
AND the playback will be full screen

title: Play: Player Controls appear for approx 3 seconds after any button is pressed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND we tap any button
custom_expected:
THEN the Play Controls overlay the video playback
AND after 3 seconds seconds they disappear
AND tapping any button again will repeat the appearing function

title: Play: Verify Player Controls function as expected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND use the ATV remote
custom_expected:
THEN the controls will function as follows:

[Up] on the D-pad will display video timeline
[Down] on the D-pad will display video timeline with markers
[Left] on the D-pad will begin to rewind the video
[Right] on the D-pad will begin to fast forward the video
[Up Up] on the D-pad will display an overlay with metadata
[Menu] button will exit the video
[Play/Pause] button will function respectfully

title: ***Play: Verify that linear playback can continue for up to 2 hours without issue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND there is a LIVE event
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to Play the event
AND we receive the Playback Option prompt
AND we select "Live"
AND we stay in the Linear stream for at least 2 hours
custom_expected:
THEN playback will continue as expected
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream

title: ***Play: User chooses "Beginning" from Playback Option Prompt
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND there is a LIVE event
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to Play the event
AND we receive the Playback Option prompt
AND we select "FROM START"
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will start
AND the location will be at the beginning
AND when the feed reaches the end the user will be returned to their original access point

**User will have been put into the NON-LINEAR feed by choosing Beginning**

title: ***Play: User chooses "Live" from Playback Option Prompt
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND there is a LIVE event
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to Play the event
AND we receive the Playback Option prompt
AND we select "Live"
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will start
AND the location will be at the current LIVE location
AND when the feed reaches the end the user will continue into the next scheduled show

**User will have been placed into the Linear feed by choosing Live**

title: ***Audio: Verify that when there is an alternate feed available, this is visible for selection
***Audio: Verify that when there is an alternate feed available, this can be selected without issue
***CC: Verify that Closed Captioning is available for live streams
***CC: Verify that Closed Captioning is available for Video on Demand streams
***CC: Verify that setting is retained
***CC: Verify user can toggle Closed Captioning "On"
***CC: Verify user can toggle Closed Captioning "Off"
***CC: Verify user Closed Caption status is properly reflected
***Marker: Jump to Live button is present and functions accordingly
***Marker: Verify user selects a milestone marker that the user is properly brought to the appropriate location
***Marker: Verify text and formatting is clear and readable
Video: Verify that 24/7 feed, the REW functionality is limited to a one hour window
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND there is a LIVE event
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to Play the event
AND we receive the Playback Option prompt
AND we select "Live" to enter the Linear Feed
AND we attempt to Rewind
custom_expected:
THEN the REW functionality will be limited to one hour
AND as the video progresses, the user will be unable to rewind to the previous point they were able to reach

**Result of the sliding window**

title: ***Video: Verify incremental Rewind speed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter a video stream
AND we attempt to Rewind
AND we press the REW control multiple times
custom_expected: THEN the REW speed should increment accordingly

title: ***Video: Verify incremental Fast Forward speed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter a video stream
AND we attempt to Rewind
AND we press the FF control multiple times
custom_expected: THEN the FF speed should increment accordingly

title: ***Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations
***Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
***Network: Verify that when switching between wireless to a wired connection the video playback continues
***Network: Verify that when switching between wired to a wireless connection that video playback continues
***Network: Verify when throttling connection strength that bitrate playback adjusts without issue in both directions
Verify: PCON settings for On Now - From Start are ignored
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Internet connection is Wired or Wireless
AND the latest build of the WWE Network application is installed
AND the user is logged into a valid WWE account
AND the Parental Controls are set to ON
AND an asset with a rating of TV-14 or above is currently in the On Now position
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the On Now asset
AND chooses the 'From Start' option
custom_expected:
THEN a preroll video will play
AND then the show selected will play (no blockage) starting from the beginning

title: Verify: PCON settings for On Now - Watch Live are ignored
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Internet connection is Wired or Wireless
AND the latest build of the WWE Network application is installed
AND the user is logged into a valid WWE account
AND the Parental Controls are set to ON
AND an asset with a rating of TV-14 or above is currently in the On Now position
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the On Now asset
AND chooses the 'Watch Live' option
custom_expected:
THEN a preroll video will play
AND then the show selected will play (no blockage) beginning from its current point in time

title: Scenario: Selecting the WWE Subscription option prompts iTunes account login
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed WWE
And we launch the Application
And we are not logged in to a web subscriber account
custom_steps:
When we tap on paid content
AND attempt to Play
AND are directed to the SignIn/SignUp page
AND select "Subscribe Now With iTunes"
custom_expected:
THEN we are brought to a Terms and Conditions page
AND in selecting 'Agree' are brought to the iTunes Store Sign-In page

title: Scenario: iTunes Account Login Fails when user attempts to purchase the WWE Subscription
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed WWE
AND we launch the Application
AND we are not logged in to a web subscriber account
AND we tap on paid content
AND select the Play button
AND we select the 'Subscribe Now With iTunes' option
AND 'Agree' to the Terms and Conditions
custom_steps: WHEN we enter invalid credentials
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be messaged that their login information is incorrect
AND the user will have options to Cancel or Retry

title: Scenario: User successfully purchases WWE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed WWE
AND we launch the Application
AND we are not logged in to a web subscriber account
AND we tap on paid content
AND select the Play button
AND we select the 'Subscribe Now With iTunes' option
AND 'Agree' to the Terms and Conditions
custom_steps:
When the user is prompted to enter iTunes credentials
AND we sign into a valid whitelisted iTunes account
AND a message is received regarding Subscription Terms
AND the user taps the 'Continue' button
And then we receive a message asking to confirm the subscription
And the user taps the 'OK' button
custom_expected:
Then the paywall will dismiss
And if the In App Purchase is successful
THEN the original video chosen will begin to play

title: Scenario: User that has previously purchased WWE through IAP, clears credentials,  then attempts to restore purchase
custom_preconds:
Given a user buys the application through in-app purchase
And the user has gone to 'My Account' and selected to 'Clear Credentials'
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to access paid content
And accesses the pay wall
And taps the 'Restore iTunes Purchase' button
custom_expected: THEN the original video chosen will begin to play

title: Scenario: User that has previously purchased WWE through IAP, attempts to restore purchase on a secondary device
custom_preconds:
NOTE:  You must have two devices handy to run this test
Both devices should be free of any logged in credentials
custom_steps:
GIVEN the user purchases the app on one device
AND then switches over to the second device
AND attempts to play a piece of paid content
THEN attempts to "Restore iTunes Purchase"
THEN the user is prompted to login to iTunes
AND uses the previous IAP credentials from the other device
custom_expected: THEN if validated, will automatically begin playback of the paid content

title: Scenario: Logged in non-entitled user attempts to access paid content
custom_preconds:
Given a user has successfully installed and launched the app
And has not previously logged in with any entitled account
And has not previously made any In-App Purchase
custom_steps:
When the user taps on paid content
And the user is presented with the paywall
And the user taps on 'Sign In With My WWE Account' button
And the user attempts to log in with a WWE web account that has not been entitled
custom_expected:
Then the paywall will dismiss
And a message screen will appear stating: "Subscription Required - You must be a current WWE Network subscriber."
AND selecting the 'OK' button will dismiss back to the Sign In page

title: Scenario: Logged in entitled user attempts to access paid content
custom_preconds:
Given a user has successfully installed and launched the app
And has not previously logged in with any entitled account
And has not previously made any In-App Purchase
custom_steps:
When the user taps on a paid feature
And the user is presented with the paywall
And the user taps on 'Sign In With My WWE Account' button
And the user logs in with a WWE web account that has been entitled
custom_expected:
Then the paywall will dismiss
AND if validated, will automatically begin playback of the paid content

title: Scenario: User attempts to make a purchase with the In-App Purchase Restriction set to ON in Settings
custom_preconds:
Given that the 'In-App Purchases' value is set to ON in the Settings > General > Restrictions
And a Passcode is entered
And 'In App Purchase' option is set to "Block"
custom_steps: When the user attempts to make a purchase in the app
custom_expected:
Then the purchase will not be completed
And the user will be notified that they need to turn on the ability to allow In-App Purchases in order to complete the purchase

title: Scenario: Verify that the In-App Purchase screen doesn't take a long time to display at minimum connectivity
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed and launched the application
And we are on a wireless connection with network conditioning
And we have limited connectivity (Minimum 3Mbps)
custom_steps:
When we navigate to the SignIn menu
And select "Subscribe Now With iTunes"
custom_expected: Then the Paywall will appear in a timely manner

title: Scenario: WWE Network account Email has been changed
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed WWE Network
And we have launched the Application
And we have navigated to the paywall
custom_steps:
When we tap the 'Sign In With My WWE Account' button
And we login with an account that has changed its email address (using the OLD email address)
And tap the Log In button
custom_expected:
Then the user gets a message:
"Subscription Required - The account name or password was incorrect.  Please try again."

title: Scenario: WWE Network account Password has been changed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed WWE Network
AND we have launched the Application
And we have navigated to the paywall
custom_steps:
When we tap the 'Sign In With My WWE Account' button
And we login with an account that has changed its password (using the OLD password)
And tap the Log In button
custom_expected:
Then the user gets a message:
"Subscription Required - The account name or password was incorrect. Please try again."

title: Scenario: Verify that the Single Sign on Restriction message reads appropriately
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed WWE Network
And we have launched the Application
And we have navigated to the paywall
custom_steps:
When we restore a purchase using the 'Restore iTunes Purchase' button
And we restore on 6 devices using the same account
And we access paid content (live media) on all 6 devices within 30 minutes
custom_expected:
Then the user will get a message explaining that too many users are trying to access media from this account
And the message is clear without grammatical errors
And the message can be dismissed
And the account will be locked for 30 minutes before allowing the user to access media again

title: Scenario: User buys the application using IAP and then links it to web subscriber account that has no previous entitlements
custom_preconds: Given a user buys the application through in-app purchase
custom_steps: When the user links it to a WWE Network web account without previous entitlement
custom_expected:
Then the web account should be linked
And we can verify that the account was linked in 'My Account'

title: Scenario: User logs into the application using a web subscriber account that has no previous entitlements and purchases IAP, user then manually links account
custom_preconds: Given the user logs into the app with a WWE Network web account without previous entitlement
custom_steps:
When a user buys the application through in-app purchase
And manually links their WWE Network web account
custom_expected:
Then the web account should be linked
And we can verify that the account was linked in the Customer Service Tool
And when we login to a second device with the linked account the proper content will be unlocked

title: Scenario: User tries to link multiple accounts to an In-App Purchase
custom_preconds:
NOTE: You will need a secondary device to verify this test.

Given a user buys the application through in-app purchase
And the user links it to a WWE web account without previous entitlement
custom_steps:
When the user logs out of their WWE web account
And logs in with a different WWE web account
And manually links the second web account
And checks the first web account through the secondary device
custom_expected:
Then the first web account should lose entitlement
And the second linked web account should be entitled with the correct features

title: Scenario: User that purchases WWE through IAP on 'Device A (iOS)' attempts to access WWE on 'Device B (iOS)' by logging in with a linked account
custom_preconds:
Given a user buys the application through in-app purchase
And the user links it to a WWE web account without previous entitlement
custom_steps: When the user attempts to use their linked account on a second device
custom_expected: Then upon successful login all entitled features should be unlocked

title: Verify Multi-language does not appear on PPV Detail Page during Live Linear Stream (Pre-Show)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
AND we have navigated to the Pay Per View Category row
custom_steps: WHEN we select the PPV Live Linear Stream
custom_expected:
THEN the PPV Show Page will open
AND the Show's title will appear 
AND the episode's metadata will appear beneath the Show title 
AND the Show's Air Time and Duration will appear
AND the Watch Live button will appear
AND the Watch from Beginning button will appear
AND the Add Episode button will appear
AND the Add Series button will appear
AND a Change Language button will NOT appear

German
Russian
Japanese

Mandarin
